resources.string: Select your fuel type to show you relevant prices
You can change this later in settings
See nearby gas stations and compare prices instantly. Fill up where it suits you best—not where you have to
Your route, with the best prices
Set your origin and destination and discover all the stations along your route (and nearby) to choose the best stop
We’ll notify you if a station drops its price so you can fill up before it goes back up
The app works offline so you can keep checking info on the road, even if you lose connection
How much does your tank hold?
Enter your tank capacity to calculate the cost of a full fill-up
You can change this later in settings
